attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Change the Law, to allow owners of all grades of Listed Homes or Buildings to install appropriate double-glazing to all windows, and allow for the installation of Photovoltaic technology within discrete roof areas, so that they cannot been seen.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
